title: Full Stack Engineer
description: Collaborated on client projects using Angular, React, and Express. Contributed to e-commerce platforms, brand websites, and responsive hotel booking websites. Assisted with DevOps on Linux servers using Nginx.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Worked on a platform to host events, conduct hackathons, and build communities. Developed the authentication layer, specifically implementing OAuth 2.0 and email verification systems. Enhanced an existing real-time communication portal based on client requirements, resulting in high client satisfaction.

title: Backend Engineer
description: Contributing to backend development for hackathon organizing platform, focusing on building scalable and reliable systems to support participant registration, project submissions, and judging processes.

title: Open Source Lead
description: Leading open source initiatives and promoting collaborative development practices within the university community. Organizing workshops and events to introduce students to open source contribution and development methodologies.

title: Tech Event Coordinator
description: Coordinated web development events at the university level, managing logistics, participant registration, and technical requirements. Facilitated workshops and competitions to enhance students' web development skills.
